Title: Relates to enacting "the earned amnesty act of 2019", authorizing the expungement of certain convictions after 10 years
Summary: Establishes the earned amnesty act of 2019 authorizing, upon petition therefor, the expungement of certain convictions after 10 years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to establishing the earned amnesty act of 2019; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
